***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

 This PR doesn't modify any tests, so it's hard to know what's being fixed, and your changes might regress in the future. Have you considered [adding tests](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#editing-tests-on-an-existing-package) to cover the change you're making? Including tests allows this PR to be merged by yourself and the owners of this module. This can potentially save days of time for you.
